Articles.Content:
how do I programmatically turn on/off engines to provide thrust?
I've tried using the [code]Engines.Enabled = bEnableEngines;[/code] but it doesn't work the way I thought.

It is probably best to use the Activate/Deactivate Event or Actions rather then trying to do it directly.

Quite often a part creator will do several things to turn something on/off, by using the actions they've created you make sure you aren't only partially turning the part off.

D.
If the part is stageable, it's even easier, just call OnActive for the module, it's virtual so no reflection needed.
